title: OpenAI Announces GPT-5 Turbo for Enterprise Use
body: OpenAI has launched GPT-5 Turbo, a faster and more efficient variant of its flagship language model. The new version promises improved reasoning, longer context handling, and reduced latency â€” making it ideal for enterprise-level automation and data analysis.

title: Apple Introduces M4 Pro Chip with Major AI Boost
body: Apple unveiled its M4 Pro chip, featuring a redesigned Neural Engine capable of over 40 trillion operations per second. The chip powers new MacBook Pro models, emphasizing real-time AI processing and energy efficiency.

title: Google Expands Gemini Integration Across Workspace
body: Google has expanded its Gemini AI assistant across Gmail, Docs, and Sheets. The rollout includes advanced summarization, voice command features, and context-aware email drafting for Workspace users.

title: Meta Unveils Horizon OS for Mixed Reality Devices
body: Meta introduced Horizon OS, a new mixed-reality operating system designed to unify its Quest devices with partner hardware. The system focuses on open development and integration with productivity apps and AI-powered collaboration tools.

title: NVIDIA Launches RTX 5090 with Record-Breaking Performance
body: NVIDIA released the RTX 5090 GPU, setting new performance records for gaming and AI workloads. Built on the Blackwell architecture, the card features improved ray-tracing capabilities and AI-assisted rendering technology.
